name: impregnate
content:
impregnate verb [T]
(ABSORB)
Add to word list
Add to word list
to cause something, usually a solid substance, to absorb something, usually a liquid: be impregnated with This cloth has been impregnated with special chemicals for cleaning computer screens.

impregnate verb [T]
(MAKE PREGNANT)
to make a woman or female animal pregnant

impregnate verb [T]
(ABSORB)
to cause a substance to absorb a liquid substance: This cloth is impregnated with a cleaning solution.
